text: The Venerable Christopher Gregorie was an Anglican priest in the 17th century."Hemera Anapauseos Or, a Discourse of the Morality of the Sabbath, Being an Exposition of Exod. XX, V. 8, 9, 10, 11. with Prayers Relating Thereunto. Humbly Offered to This Present Age" by John Gregory Archdeacon Of Gloucester Gregory was educated at Magdalen College, Oxford.Alumni Oxonienses 1500-1714, Greenhill-Gysby He held livings at Hempstead, Dursley and Holme Lacy. Gregory was Archdeacon of Gloucester from 1673 until his death on 10 December 1678. == Notes == Category:1678 deaths Category:Alumni of Magdalen College, Oxford Category:Archdeacons of Gloucester Category:17th-century English Anglican priests
title: John Gregory (priest)
